html.p: At the end of this sequence, and after some practice, you should be able to:

li.p: Determine when a list of vectors in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] is a basis of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline].
Identify a common property of all bases of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline].
Find coordinates of a vector relative to a basis.

html.p: For time budgeting purposes, this sequence has 4 videos totaling 23 minutes, plus some questions.
